item.title: List crontab for all users
item.description: for user in $(cut -f1 -d: /etc/passwd); do echo $user; crontab -u $user -l; done for user in $(cut -f1 -d: /etc/passwd); do echo $user; crontab -u $user -l; done

item.title: Quick crontab man
item.description: #minute (0-59), #| hour (0-23), #| | day of the month (1-31), #| | | month of the year (1-12), #| | | | day of the week (0-6 with 0=Sunday). #| | | | | commands */5 2 * * 0,4 sh /home/mod/script.sh >/dev/null 2>&1`
